wrangler.title: Wrangler Login
wrangler.subtitle: Set up <0>%{email}</0> to manage Workers with Wrangler
wrangler.card.body: An API token for <0>%{email}</0> will be generated and passed to Wrangler to grant the following permissions:
wrangler.card.edit_permissions: <0>Edit</0>: Workers Scripts, Workers Routes, Workers KV Storage
wrangler.card.warning: If you did not run <0>wrangler login</0>, you should not authorize this request.
wrangler.card.title.loggedin: Wrangler is now authorized with a new <0>API Token</0>
wrangler.card.description.loggedin: You can now close this page.
wrangler.card.title.failed: Failed to create API Token for Wrangler
wrangler.card.description.failed: Only a maximum of 50 tokens can be created. Remove an <0>API Token</0>, and try again or use `wrangler config`.
